10namespace proto::interface {
11using CallbackType =
12 std::function<void(CustomSpan<uint8_t> buffer, size_t &read)>;
13using Delegate = std::shared_ptr<CallbackType>;
14
15using namespace std::chrono_literals;
16
17class IInterface {
18 public:
19 virtual ~IInterface() = default;
20 explicit IInterface(const char *name) : m_name(name) {};
21 virtual auto write(CustomSpan<uint8_t> buffer,
22 std::chrono::milliseconds timeout = 1s) -> bool = 0;
23
24 virtual auto is_open() -> bool = 0;
25 virtual auto open() -> bool = 0;
26 virtual auto close() -> bool = 0;
27 [[nodiscard]] virtual auto add_receive_callback(const CallbackType &callback)
28 -> Delegate {
29 auto callback_ = std::make_shared<CallbackType>(callback);
30 m_callbacks.push_back(callback_);
31 return callback_;
32 }
33
34 protected:
35 std::string m_name;
36 std::vector<std::weak_ptr<CallbackType>> m_callbacks;
37
38 private:
39 virtual auto read(uint8_t *buffer, size_t count) -> int = 0;
40};
41} // namespace proto::interface
